articles.title: Abhilash Tomy completes the Golden Globe Race, finishing second; makes maritime adventure history - The Indian Express
articles.description: At the heart of this 8-month oceanic thriller were two incredible forces of nature. Kirsten Neuschafer,  the South African 40 year old, and the only woman on the starting line. Abhilash Tomy, the Indian 44 year old, retired naval pilot, the only repeat entran…
articles.content: Tinker, sailor, soldier. Sprightly at 44. Battered, but never broken. With a titanium rod in his spine. Cdr Abhilash Tomy built himself a boat out of thermocol when he was 12. At 44, the veteran of t… [+8134 chars]
